handlers.code:
system.print("=== CONTAINER TYPE CHECK ===")
system.print("")

local containerCount = 0
local itemContainers = 0
local containerGroups = 0
local containerHubs = 0

for slot_name, slot in pairs(unit) do
    if type(slot) == "table" and slot.getClass then
        local className = slot.getClass()
        if string.match(className, "Container") then
            containerCount = containerCount + 1
            local id = slot.getLocalId()
            system.print("Slot " .. slot_name .. ": " .. className .. " (ID: " .. id .. ")")
            
            if className == "ItemContainer" then
                itemContainers = itemContainers + 1
            elseif string.match(className, "ContainerGroup") then
                containerGroups = containerGroups + 1
            elseif string.match(className, "ContainerHub") then
                containerHubs = containerHubs + 1
            end
        end
    end
end

system.print("")
system.print("=== SUMMARY ===")
system.print("Total containers: " .. containerCount)
system.print("ItemContainer: " .. itemContainers)
system.print("ContainerGroup: " .. containerGroups)
system.print("ContainerHub: " .. containerHubs)
system.print("")
system.print("Original code looked for: Container%a+Group")
if containerGroups > 0 or containerHubs > 0 then
    system.print("MATCH: You have compatible containers!")
else
    system.print("NO MATCH: Only ItemContainers found")
    system.print("This might be why onContentUpdate doesn't work!")
end

unit.exit()
